name: Classic TV Stars as Guest Stars Online Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which member of the cast of 'Gilligan's Island' also appeared on 'That Girl'?
questions.explanation:
Russell Johnson.

	Johnson played an airplane pilot.

questions.text: Which member of 'WKRP in Cincinnati' appeared in 'Three's Company'?
questions.explanation:
Loni Anderson.

	She played a romantic interest of Jack's.

questions.text: Which member(s) of 'Bewitched' appeared on the (original) 'Twilight Zone'?
questions.explanation:
All of them.

	York played a bank clerk. Moorehead fought off a UFO. Montgomery co-starred with Charles Bronson.

questions.text: Which member of 'Golden Girls' also appeared on 'The Odd Couple'?
questions.explanation:
Betty White.

	She played herself in a 'Password' episode.

questions.text: Which member(s) of 'Mission Impossible' appeared on 'Dick Van Dyke'?
options: Lynda Day George and Lesley Warren
questions.explanation:
Barbara Bain and Greg Morris.

	Bain played Rob's old girl friends. Morris appeared as an army budy and as a new father.

questions.text: Which member of 'McHale's Navy' appeared on 'Hogan's Heroes'?
questions.explanation:
Gavin MacLeod.

	He played a nazi.

questions.text: Which member of 'Happy Days' appeared in 'MASH'?
questions.explanation:
Ron Howard.

	He played a young soldier.

questions.text: Which member of the Bob Newhart comedies ('Newhart', 'Bob Newhart') appeared on 'Mary Tyler Moore'?
questions.explanation:
Mary Frann.

	She played a short-lived friend.

questions.text: Which member of 'Murder, She Wrote' appeared on (the original) 'Star Trek'?
questions.explanation:
William Windom.

	He played a starship commander.

questions.text: Which member of 'Get Smart' appeared on 'Cheers'?
questions.explanation:
Barbara Feldon.

	She played Sam's girl friend.
